column5: I am heading up to the big lake in two weeks. Going to fish mainly around the Sawmill area. Do any of you know how the cell phone coverage is up there? Because it is such a big lake, I would like to have my cell phone along just in case. Any help would be appreciated.Otts

Do a search on verizon cell phone. There were some posts about using cell phones in the Ear Falls area. Verizon will work there if you have canada added to your package. I doubt that you will get coverage in sawmill. If they don't get rain it won't matter as there isn't much water in sawmill now.
